channel.title: Blog on Kaho Abe 阿部香穂

item.title: New Website
item.description: The significance of each item on the border. I’ve finally finished my new website! I’d be lying if I said that building this website has been easy for me. I’ve spent about a year trying out new tools, restarting, re-designing over and over again.
